pullrequest.title: Add a table model that uses lightmap

content.raw: That's the downside of using lightmaps for now. If someone wants to use lightmaps, they should have an idea where the model will be in simulation then bake the lightmap texture using the correct lighting direction within their 3D modelling tool. The model should just remain static there. We could also support lightmap generation on the fly, which probably means integrating code from projects like blender. OGRE currently doesn't have support for this.
